posts.post_content: maybe the other playable cascade. the haste is the key, sans haste this would be no good, but some free burn/removal/extra attacker or blocker is awesome. hells thunder, hellspark elemental, any number of hasty drawback red guys is awesome with this card.

Posted By: Sicktoid (5/11/2009 6:44:12 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The best cascade card of all. 4 mana for a 3/2 haste plus a free Ball Lightning or what have you, AND it thins the deck by one card. AND cascade still triggers even if the Elf is countered or dealt with.  
  
Cascade is a broken ability. It is a very FUN ability though. Still, I'm not quite sure what the design team was thinking when they deemed cascade "balanced." They could've changed SOMEthing about the mechanics of it to make it more balanced.
posts.html:
The best cascade card of all. 4 mana for a 3/2 haste plus a free Ball Lightning or what have you, AND it thins the deck by one card. AND cascade still triggers even if the Elf is countered or dealt with.

Cascade is a broken ability. It is a very FUN ability though. Still, I'm not quite sure what the design team was thinking when they deemed cascade "balanced." They could've changed SOMEthing about the mechanics of it to make it more balanced.
